item.title: Realy need help [317]
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

i got this code

[code]if((Playerrights >= 0)) {
sM(“Welcome To SeaScape.”);
sM(“Read the rules carefully”);
sM(“Respect staff and othe players”);
sM(“have fun!”);
}
if((Playerrights >= 1)) {
sM(“Welcome To SeaScape moderator.”);
sM(“Read the rules carefully”);
sM(“also read staffrules at ::staffrules”);
sM(“Respect staff and othe players”);
sM(“have fun!”);
}
if((Playerrights >= 2)) {
sM(“Welcome To SeaScape administrator.”);
sM(“Read the rules carefully”);
sM(“also read staffrules at ::staffrules”);
sM(“Respect staff and othe players”);
sM(“have fun!”);
}
if((Playerrights >= 3)) {
sM(“Welcome To SeaScape owner.”);
sM(“Read the rules carefully”);
sM(“also read staffrules at ::staffrules”);
sM(“Respect staff and othe players”);
sM(“have fun!”);
}

        if ((playerRights >= 2)) {
            yell("@yel@The Administrator " +playerName+ " has logged in@yel@");
        } else if ((playerRights >= 1)) {
            yell("@yel@The Moderator " +playerName+ " has logged in@yel@");
        } else if ((playerRights >= 3)) {
            yell("@red@The Owner " +playerName+ " has logged in@red@");

}[/code]
but when i compile i get this errors

client.java:11027: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Playerrights location: class client if((Playerrights >= 0)) { ^ client.java:11033: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Playerrights location: class client if((Playerrights >= 1)) { ^ client.java:11040: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Playerrights location: class client if((Playerrights >= 2)) { ^ client.java:11047: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Playerrights location: class client if((Playerrights >= 3)) { ^ client.java:11056: cannot find symbol symbol : method yell(java.lang.String) location: class client yell("@yel@The Administrator " +playerName+ " has logged in@yel@ "); ^ client.java:11058: cannot find symbol symbol : method yell(java.lang.String) location: class client yell("@yel@The Moderator " +playerName+ " has logged in@yel@"); ^ client.java:11060: cannot find symbol symbol : method sMall(java.lang.String) location: class client yell("@red@The Owner " +playerName+ " has logged in@red@"); ^ 7 errors Finished! Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .
if someone can help me?
